summary: Currently working as a product designer at NextCapital, I spend my days right in the intersection between design, research and development!

I consider myself first and foremost a human-centered designer with a jack-of-all trades mentality. Understanding the constraints and negotiating with stakeholders allows me to create designs that solve problems for the end user as well as the business.
Outside of work, I have been taking advantage of the nice weather and exploring the city of Chicago while trying out all new foods this city has to offer.
